CommandGive.label: Give Command
CommandGive.tooltip: Command that users will use when they want to transfer currency.

GiveTaxPercent.label: Tax Percent For Give Command
GiveTaxPercent.tooltip: Tax percent that will use take into account when users transfer currency.

MinGiveAmount.label: Minimum Give Command Amount
MinGiveAmount.tooltip: Minimum amount of currency to transfer.

MaxGiveAmount.label: Maximum Give Command Amount
MaxGiveAmount.tooltip: Maximum amount of currency to transfer.

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the script commands.

PermissionDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: You have to be a {0} to use {1} command!
PermissionDeniedMessage.label: Permission Denied Message
PermissionDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on failed permission check. 0 — required permission, 1 — command.

PermissionInfo.label: Info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

InvalidCommandCallMessage.label: Invalid Command Call Message
InvalidCommandCallMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a command with invalid parameters. 0 — command, 1 — command usage example.

SuccessfulTransferMessage.label: Transfer Success Message
SuccessfulTransferMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful transfer of currency. 0 — user, 1 — amount, 2 — currency name, 3 — target.

NotEnoughFundsMessage.label: Not Enough Funds Message
NotEnoughFundsMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesn't have enough funds. 0 — user, 1 — currency name.

InvalidAmountMessage.value: Sorry {0}, {1} isn't a valid amount. Please, choose integral amount in range [{2}–{3}]
InvalidAmountMessage.label: Invalid Amount Message
InvalidAmountMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specify invalid amount to transfer. 0 — user, 1 — specified amount, 2 — min possible amount, 3 — max possible amount.

NoTargetMessage.value: Sorry {0}, but you didn't say who to send the {1} to.
NoTargetMessage.label: No Target Message
NoTargetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesn't specify a target. 0 — user, 1 — currency name.

InvalidTargetMessage.label: Invalid Target Message
InvalidTargetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies an invalid target. 0 — user, 1 — target.

TransferToYourselfMessage.value: Sorry {0}, but you cannot transfer {1} to yourself.
TransferToYourselfMessage.label: Transfer To Yourself Message
TransferToYourselfMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to transfer to yourself. 0 — user, 1 — currency name.

AllowLoggingToFile.label: Allow Logging To File
AllowLoggingToFile.tooltip: Allow script to log to file in script folder.
